saśailavanadhātrīṇāṃ yathādhāro ’hināyakaḥ/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ tathādhāro hi kuṇḍalī//
suptā guruprasādena yadā jāgarti kuṇḍalī/
sarvāṇi padmāni bhidyante granthayo’pi ca//
prāṇasya śūnyapadavī
rājapathāyate/
cittaṃ nirālambaṃ kālasya vañcanam//
suṣumṇā śūnyapadavī brahmarandhraṃmahā/
śāmbhavī //
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena m īśvarīm/
brahmadvāramukhe suptāṃ mudrābhyāsaṃ samācaret//
mahāmudrā mahābandho mahāvedhaś ca khecarī/
mūla jālandharābhidhaḥ//
karaṇī viparītākhyā vajrolī śakticālanam/
daśakaṃ jarāmaraṇanāśanam//
ādināthoditaṃ divyam aṣṭaiśvaryapradāyakam/
vallabhaṃ sarvasiddhānāṃ durlabhaṃ marutām api//
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena yathā ratnakaraṇḍakam/
kasyacin naiva vaktavyaṃ kulastrīsurataṃ yathā//
pādamūlena vāmena yoniṃ saṃpīḍya dakṣiṇam/
pādaṃ prasāritaṃ karābhyāṃ pūrayen mukhe//
kaṇṭhe samāropya dhārayed vāyum ūrdhvataḥ/
yathā daṇḍāhataḥ sarpo daṇḍākāraḥ prajāyate//
ṛjvībhūtā tathā śaktiḥ kuṇḍalī sahasā bhavet/
maraṇāvasthā jāyate śritā//
tataḥ śanaiḥ śanair eva recayen na tu vegataḥ/
iyaṃ khalu mahāmudrā mahāsiddhaiḥ praśasyate//
mahākleśāyatā doṣā jīryante maraṇādayaḥ/
mahā ca tenaiva vadanti vibudhottamāḥ//
candrāṅge tu samabhyasya sūryāṅge /
yāva bhave tato mudrāṃ visarjayet//
na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve’pi nīrasāḥ/
api bhuktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam iva jīryate//
kṣayakuṣṭhagudāvartagulmājīrṇapurogamāḥ/
tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo’bhyaset//
kathiteyaṃ mahāmudrā /
gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit//
vāmasya pādasya yonisthāne niyojayet/
vāmorūpari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ caraṇaṃ tathā//
pūrayitvā vāyuṃ hṛdaye cibukaṃ dṛḍham/
yonim ākuñcya mano madhye niyojayet//
dhārayitvā yathāśaktyā recayed anilaṃ śanaiḥ//
savyāṅge pūrvam abhyasya dakṣiṇāṅge punarbhyaset//
matam atra tu keṣāṃcit kaṇṭhabandhaṃ visarjayet/
//
ayaṃ khalu mahābandho mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
kālapāśamahābandhavimocanavicakṣaṇaḥ//
ayaṃ ca sarvanāḍīnām ūrdhvaṃgativibodhakaḥ/
triveṇīsaṅgamaṃ dhatte kedāraṃ prāpayen manaḥ//
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpannā yathā strī puruṣaṃ vinā/
mahāmudrāmahābandho vedhavarjitaḥ//
mahābandhosthito yogī kṛtvā pūraka/
gatim āvṛtya nibhṛtaṃ kaṇṭhamudrayā//
samahasta bhūmau sphijau saṃtāḍayec chanaiḥ/
puṭadvayaṃ samākramya vāyu sphurati /
bandhenānena sādhayet sarvam īpsitam//
somasūryāgni jāyate cāmṛtāya vai/
mṛtāvasthā samutpannā tato //
mahāvedho’yan mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
valīpalitaghnaḥ sevyate sādhakottamaiḥ//
etat trayaṃ mahā jarāmṛtyuvināśanam/
vahnivṛddhikaraṃ aṇimādiguṇapradam//
aṣṭadhā kriyate caivaṃ yāme yāme dine dine/
puṇya pāpaughabhiduraṃ sadā//
samyakśikṣāvatām eva svalpaṃ prathama/
vahnistrīpathasevānām ādau varjana//
/
bhrūmadhyaṃ spṛśati //
kapālakuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā/
bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī//
kalāṃ parāṅmukhīṃ /
mudrā vyomacakraṃ tad ucyate/
rasanām ūrdhvagāṃ kṛtvā
kṣaṇārdhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhati/
viṣair vi° mucyate yogī vyādhimṛtyujarādibhiḥ//
na rogo maraṇaṃ tasya na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā/
na ca mūrchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti //
cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā/
tenaiṣā khecarī nāma mudrā siddhair namaskṛtā//
khecaryā mudritaṃ yena vivaraṃ lambikordhvataḥ/
kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāśleṣitasya ca//
calito’pi yadā binduḥ /
vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ yogamudrayā//
indhanāni here.}
ūrdhva sthiro bhūtvā somapānaṃ karoti yaḥ/
māsārdhena na saṃdeho mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit//
nityaṃ somakalāpūrṇaṃ śarīraṃ yasya /
takṣakeṇāpi viṣaṃ tasya na sarpati//
indhanāni yathā vahni ca dīpakaḥ/
tathā somakalāpūrṇaṃ dehī dehaṃ //
gomāṃsaṃ bhakṣayen nityaṃ pibed amaravāruṇīm/
kulīnaṃ tam ahaṃ manye kulaghātakāḥ//
gośabdenoditā jihvā tatpraveśo hi tāluni/
gomāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ tat tu mahāpātakanāśanam//
jihvāpraveśasaṃbhūta /
sā syād amaravāruṇī//
ṣoḍaśagalitaṃ prāṇād avāptaṃ haṭhā-
d ūrdhvāsyo rasanāṃ vivare śaktiṃ parāṃ cintayet/
vimalaṃ dhārāmṛtaṃ yaḥ pibet
nirdoṣaḥ sa mṛṇālakomalavapurr yogī ciraṃ jīvati//
cumbantī yadi lambikāgram aniśaṃ jihvā rasasyandinī
sakṣārā dugdhasadṛśī madhvājyatulyā/
vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ jarāntakaraṇaṃ
tasya syād amaratvam aṣṭaguṇavat siddhāṅganākarṣaṇam//
ekaṃ sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ ekā mudrā ca khecarī/
eko devo vasthā manonmanī//
pārṣṇibhāgena saṃpīḍya yonim ākuñcayed gudam/
apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandho’yam ucyate//
ūrdhvagaṃ kurute /
ākuñcanena taṃ prāhur mūlabandhaṃ tu yoginaḥ//
gudaṃ saṃpīḍya kuñcayed balāt/
vāraṃ vāraṃ cordhvaṃ samāyāti samīraṇaḥ//
prāṇāpānau nādabindū mūlabandhena caikatām/
gatvā yogasya nātra saṃśayaḥ//
apānaprāṇayor aikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ/
yuvā bhavati vṛddho’pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt//
apāne cordhvage jāte saṃprāpte /
tadānalaśikhā dīrghā //
tato svarūpakam/
pradīptas tu jvalano dehajas tathā//
tena kuṇḍalinī suptā /
daṇḍāhatā bhujaṅgīva niśvasya ṛjutāṃ vrajet//
bilaṃ tato brahmanāḍyantaraṃ vrajet/
tasmān nityaṃ mūlabandhaḥ kartavyo yogibhiḥ sadā//
yena suṣumṇāyāṃ prāṇa yataḥ/
tasmā’yaṃ yogibhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ//
kurute yasmād aaviśrāṃta mahākhagaḥ/
tad eva syā bandho ’bhidhīyate//
udare nābher ūrdhvaṃ ca kārayet/
bandho mṛtyumātaṅgakesarī//
tu sahajaṃ guruṇā kathitaṃ /
abhyase vṛddho’pi taruṇo bhavet//
nābher ūrdhvam adhaś cāpi tāṇaṃ kuryāt prayatnataḥ/
ṣaṇmāsam abhyasan mṛtyuṃ jayaty eva na saṃśayaḥ//
sati vajrāsane pādau karābhyāṃ dhārayed dṛḍham/
gulphadeśa kandaṃ //
paścimaṃ tāṇam kāraye/
śanaiḥ śanair yathā saṃdhiṃ gacchati//
sarveṣām eva bandhānām uttamo /
dṛḍhe bandhe muktiḥ svābhāvikī bhavet//
kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayedṛḍham icchayā/
bandho jālandharākhyo’yaṃ amṛtavyayakārakaḥ//
jāla nabhojalam/
tato jālandharo bandhaḥ duḥkhaughanāśanaḥ//
jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭhasaṃkocalakṣaṇe/
na pīyūṣaṃ pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ //
kaṇṭhasaṃkocanenaiva dve nāḍyau dhruvam/
m idaṃ jñeyaṃ ṣoḍaśādhārabandhanam//
bandhatrayam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ /
sarveṣāṃ tantrāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ yogino viduḥ//
mūlasthānaṃ tu kārayet/
baddhvā vāhaye patham//
anenaiva vidhānena /
tato na jāyate tathā//
ūrdhvaṃ nābhir ūrdhvaṃ bhānur adhaḥ śaśī/
guruvākyena //
karaṇī viparītākhyā sarvavyādhivināśinī/
nityam abhyāsayuktasya jaṭharāgni//
āhāro bahulas tasya saṃpādyaḥ sādhakasya tu/
yadi bhaveagnidehaṃ haret kṣaṇāt//
adhaḥ kṣaṇaṃ syāt prathame dine/
kiṃcid adhikam abhyasec ca dine dine//
palitaṃ caiva /
yāmamātraṃ tu yo nityam abhyaset sa tu kālajit//
svecchayā vartamāno’pi r niyamair vinā/
vijānāti sa yogī siddhibhājanam//
tatra vastudvayaṃ vakṣye durlabhaṃ yasya kasya cit/
kṣīraṃ caikaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu nārī ca vaśavartinī//
śanaiḥ samyam abhyaset/
puruṣo vāpi nārī vā siddhim āpnuyāt//
yatnataḥ vajra/
śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prakurvīta vāyusaṃcārakāraṇāt//
bhage patam abhyāsenordhvam āharet/
calitaṃ tu svakaṃ bindum ūrdhvam ākṛṣya rakṣayet//
evaṃ binduṃ mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit/
maraṇaṃ bindupātena jīvitaṃ bindudhāraṇāt//
r yogino dehaṃ jāyate bindu/
yāva dehe tāva//
cittāyattaṃ nṛṇāṃ śukraṃ śukrāyattaṃ jīvitam/
tasmāc chukraṃ manaś caiva rakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnataḥ//
binduṃ ca rakṣayet/
meḍhreṇākarṣayed ūrdhvaṃ samyagabhyāsayogavān//
vajrolyā /
gomaya//

āsīnayoḥ sukhenaiva mukta //

dehasiddhiṃ ca labhate yogataḥ/
ayaṃ yogo //
gaṅgāyamunayor madhye bālaraṇḍā sarasvatī/
balātkāreṇa gṛhṇīyāt tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam//
pucchaṃ suptād abhīḥ/
nidrāṃ vihāya sā ṛjvī m uttiṣṭhate haṭhāt//
vajrāsanasthito yogī cālayitvā kuṇḍalīm/
d anantaraṃ kuṇḍalīm āśu bodhayet//
bhānor ākuñcanaṃ kuryāt kuṇḍalīṃ cālayet tataḥ/
mṛtyuvaktragatasyāpi tasya mṛtyubhayaṃ kutaḥ//
muhūrtadvayaparyantaṃ /
ūrdhvam ākṛṣyate kiṃcit suṣumṇāṃ kuṃḍalīgatāṃ//
suṣumṇāyāḥ mukhaṃ dhruvam/
jahāti tasmāt prāṇo’yaṃ suṣumṇāṃ vrajati svanaḥ//
t saṃcālayen nityaṃ m arundhatīm/
yogī //
yena śaktiḥ sa yogī bhājanam/
kim atra bahunoktena kālaṃ jayati līlayā//
vibhūtyā saha /
divya//
iti mudrā daśa proktā ādināthena śambhunā/

rājayogaṃ vinā pṛthvī rājayogaṃ vinā niśā/
rājayogaṃ vinā mudrā vicitrāpi na rājate//
mārutasya vidhiṃ sarvaṃ manoyuktaṃ samabhyaset/
itaratra na kartavyā manovṛtti//
madhyamā nāḍī dṛḍhābhyāsena yoginām/
prāṇamudrābhiḥ saralā bhavet//
vinidrāṇāṃ anudruta samādhiṣu/
parā mudrā bhadrāṃ siddhiṃ prayacchati//
